alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:13AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New London and southern Middlesex Counties through 800 AM EDT... At 713 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Saybrook, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New London, Groton, Old Saybrook, Salem, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, East Haddam, Old Lyme, Westbrook, Lyme, North Lyme, Montville, Essex and Deep River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London
